title: Trajectories
description: It has an uplifting spirit to the album and is in more of the realm of artistic expression than it is categorically an "Ambient" album. Trajectories has 7 great ambient songs that are lush and vibrant. This music is alive and a deep sense of wonder and amazement is felt throughout the entire album. There are guitars and of course very layered ambient drones. You'll also find processed vocal, and slow-motion piano that is really enjoyable to listen to. I hope that the recording conveys more than I intended.

THE BEST RECORDINGS OF 2004! --Dene Bebbington - Wind and WireThis CD and his other music takes you away to different mindscapes. Highly recommended --Ken OliverTrajectories has an organic quality similar to what gives nature its beauty. --Lloyd Barde Backroads Music
Diatonis is an ambient artist from southern california.
